spec_data.Name: diffuse
spec_data.Description:
Diffuse is a graphical tool for merging and comparing text files. Diffuse is
able to compare an arbitrary number of files side-by-side and gives users the
ability to manually adjust line-matching and directly edit files. Diffuse can
also retrieve revisions of files from Bazaar, CVS, Darcs, Git, Mercurial,
Monotone, RCS, Subversion, and SVK repositories for comparison and merging.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:08:31 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Graphical tool for merging and comparing text files
